TextView.android:text: Welcome to BookStore Management System. A reliable and efficient Android application for a wide range of books.This application allows the admin/owner to add,manage variety of books for it's customers. Also admin has authority to manage user's profile/account. It's a convenient app for users who have interest in books. All they have to do is to get registered in application, get logged in and then search for their desired books. In this way,users can get rid of traditional way of spending their valuable time for visiting and searching for desired books in libraries or book stores giving it a portal way to trading of books.
